attr.title: Open Hexagon
attr.desc: Open Hexagon is an open-source arcade game developed by Vittorio Romeo, inspired by Terry Cavanagh's Super Hexagon. Players control a triangle, rotating it to avoid incoming walls and survive as long as possible. The game introduces mechanics like a 180Â° swap move and curving walls, enhancing the original concept. Its powerful Lua scripting system enables players to create and share custom levels, fostering a community of user-generated content.
attr.inst: Download the game on Steam (Paid) or Itch.io (Paid), or the game files on Github (Free) and copy the "Packs" and "Assets" folders into the "openhexagon" directory.
